Code Documentation¶

Views¶

Views used to render OAI-PMH response XML.

class django_oaipmh.views.OAIProvider(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
delegate(verb)[source]¶

Determine the verb, add it to the context and pass to the appropriate handler.

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Call get() or post() & handle errors with error().

get(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Parse GET parameters and send them to delegate().

post(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Parse POST parameters and send them to delegate().

validate_config()[source]¶

Check that the provider configuration is valid.

Models¶

Models for exposing OAI-PMH harvestable metadata from objects.

class django_oaipmh.models.OAIItem[source]¶

Mixin used to indicate that a given class can expose its metadata for harvest via an django_oaipmh.views.OAIProvider.

classmethod get_oai()[source]¶

Should return an iterable comprising the set of all OAIItem s of a given type. Default implementation is Django’s objects.all(); override to customize.

get_oai_record(metadata_prefix)[source]¶

Retrieve an XML metadata object for the item in a specified format. Requires a method of the form get_oai_record_[format] to be implemented for each format.

oai_datestamp()[source]¶

Override to return a modification date/timestamp. Supported formats are YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ. Should match the granularity specified by the django_oaipmh.views.OAIProvider that will expose this item.

oai_identifier()[source]¶

Override to return a unique identifier for the item. See the OAI guidelines for more information on identifier formats.

oai_sets()[source]¶

Override to return an iterable of OAISet (s) that the item belongs to.

class django_oaipmh.models.OAIItemManager[source]¶

Manager that can aggregate and filter OAIItem s.

all()[source]¶

Returns an iterable chain object of all OAIItem s in the repository.

get(identifier)[source]¶

Returns a single OAIItem by its identifier.

class django_oaipmh.models.OAISet[source]¶

Mixin used to indicate that a given class is an OAI set.

classmethod get_oai()[source]¶

Should return an iterable comprising the set of all OAISet s of a given type. Default implementation is Django’s objects.all(); override to customize.

oai_items()[source]¶

Override to return an iterable of this set’s OAIItem s.

oai_sets()[source]¶

Override to return an iterable of OAISet (s) that the set belongs to.

class django_oaipmh.models.OAISetManager[source]¶

Manager that can aggregate and filter OAISet s.

all()[source]¶

Returns a list of all OAISet s in the repository.
